verbs.description: Mueller , in his investigation of President Donald Trump , his campaign and [ARG1: possible wrongdoing] [V: connected] [ARG2: to Russia] , is focused on George Nader 's role in two high - level get - togethers . Nader has a pedophilia conviction in Europe .
